DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect Motivational Interviewing ( MI ) probationer progress 6-month period , use probation officer MI provider .
DOC.brief_title: An Evaluation Motivational Interviewing Increase Compliance Probation Setting
DOC.criteria: 1 . Participants must felony probation . 2 . Participants must English speaking . 3 . Participants must classify medium highrisk . 4 . Participants must place nonspecialized caseload . 5 . Participants must least 18 year age . 1 . Does speak English . 2 . Is less 18 year old . 3 . Is felony probation . 4 . Is classified medium highrisk . 5 . Is place specialized caseload .
